Package game.items.weapons

Class GiantHammer

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.items.weapons.GiantHammer
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.Weapon, PlayerSell
public class GiantHammer
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
implements PlayerSell
A class representing a Giant Hammer, which is a type of WeaponItem. It has the capability to perform powerful attacks.

    • MERCHANT_GIANT_HAMMER_BUYING_PRICE

      public static final int MERCHANT_GIANT_HAMMER_BUYING_PRICE
      The buying price of a Giant Hammer when sold to a merchant. Merchants will buy Giant Hammers at this price.

    • GiantHammer

      public GiantHammer()

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the Giant Hammer when it's in a location. It includes the SellAction against other actors(Who has MERCHANT status) at the location. It includes the AttackAction against other actors at the location.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor to perform actions on.
      location - The location where the Giant Hammer is.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions.

    • playerSellItem

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playerSellItem​(int sellingPrice)
      Create a Sell action for selling the Giant Hammer to another actor.
      Specified by:
      playerSellItem in interface PlayerSell
      Parameters:
      sellingPrice - The price at which the Giant Hammer is sold.
      Returns:
      A Sell action.
